name: Sudoku Puzzle Challenge
description:
Sudoku Puzzle Challenge is no ordinary Sudoku game, it’s 6 different number puzzle games in one! Packed with over 32,000 puzzles to tease your brain for a very long time.

Just fill the grid with numbers so that every row, column and 3x3 box contain all the numbers from 1-9, it sounds simple but it’s ludicrously addictive - and that’s just Sudoku.

Maybe you’re bored of ordinary Sudoku? Then try one of the 5 other puzzle types included:
* ‘Killer’ Sudoku
* Sudoku-X
* Mini Sudoku
* Kakuro
* Mini Sudoku-X

Main Features:
* Over 32,000 puzzles spread over 6 different types give you almost endless challenge.
* Easy, Medium and Hard versions of every puzzle type.
* Easy-to-use interface designed specifically for mobile and tablet.
